DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate compare effect Altaire Gel form solution Refresh Tears mild-moderate dry eye patient .
DOC.brief_title: Altaire Gel Forming Solution Versus Refresh Tears Treatment Dry Eye Signs Symptoms
DOC.criteria: Patients 18 year old . Males female . Patient report dry eye symptom ( episodic , annoy , activity limiting ) . Physician assessment mildmoderate dry eye . Patient willing instill drop TID complete entire length protocol . TBUT _ < 10 second . At least Grade 6 Corneal Staining . Current topical cyclosporine use ( Restasis ) Current Refresh use . Refractive surgery within last 6 month . Oral topical corticosteroid use . Severe dry eye patient physician assessment . Current active blepharitis . Oral doxycycline use . Oral antihistamine use .
